overview:
Mr. Patrick Vogt joined Datran Media from Enliven Marketing Technologies where he served as CEO from 2005 until he successfully merged the company with a larger publicly traded company.

Prior to his role at Enliven, Mr. Vogt established himself as a highly respected technology executive with some of the industry’s most reputable brands including Sony, Dell and HP.

During his initial tenure at Sony in 1991, Mr. Vogt was vice president and general manager, Sony’s direct-to-consumer business. In 1999 he joined Dell as general manager responsible for the aftermarket sales and marketing division and Dell Online. Mr. Vogt subsequently joined HP as vice president and general manager, Americas e-business group & direct marketing group. His team managed all direct marketing activities and the direct online business for the Americas region. During his second tenure at Sony he was senior vice president and senior general manager of Sony e-solutions company LLC. His team was responsible for internet properties management, direct marketing and sales across all customer segments and product offerings. Other responsibilities included global contact center governance, the e-commerce and contact center platform (supporting all distribution channels) and P&L management.
